description: This file defines REST API resources for managing network devices, including listing, creating, updating, deleting, and pinging devices, with database interactions and error handling.

classes.name: DevicesResource
classes.description: Handles collection-level operations for devices, such as listing all devices and creating new devices.

classes.name: DeviceResource
classes.description: Handles individual device operations like retrieving, updating, and deleting a device by name.

classes.name: PingResource
classes.description: Provides functionality to ping a device by name and report its status.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Lists all devices or retrieves a device by name, depending on the class.

methods.name: post
methods.description: Creates a new device with a unique name.

methods.name: put
methods.description: Updates device details such as IP, type, and location.

methods.name: get (in PingResource)
methods.description: Pings a device by name and returns status, details, and timestamp.
